snippet: The Supreme Court should follow its own precedent and uphold overall campaign contribution limits.
abstract: Editorial notes Supreme Court will once again take up the regulation of money in politics in McCutcheon v Federal Election Commission, which challenges the constitutionality of overall cap on individual contributions; calls on court to uphold limits, arguing case poses even greater risk to the integrity of elected officials than its controversial Citizens United ruling.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court should follow its own precedent and uphold overall campaign contribution limits.

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
